Klasse QuizSessionDTO

java.lang.Object
quizlogic.DataTransportObject
quizlogic.dto.QuizSessionDTO
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class QuizSessionDTO extends DataTransportObject
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a quiz session.

A quiz session tracks a user's progress through a quiz, including:

  • Session timestamp for when the quiz was started
  • The user ID of the person taking the quiz
  • A collection of all user answers provided during the session

This class extends DataTransportObject for consistent ID management and validation handling across the application.

Quiz sessions can be persisted to track user performance and provide statistical analysis of quiz results.

Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios

  • Konstruktordetails

    • QuizSessionDTO

      public QuizSessionDTO()
      Default constructor for creating a new quiz session.

      Initializes the session with:

      • Current timestamp
      • Default user ID of -1 (indicating no user assigned yet)
      • Empty list of user answers

    • QuizSessionDTO

      public QuizSessionDTO(int id)
      Constructor for creating a quiz session representing an existing persisted session.

      Initializes with current timestamp, default user ID, and empty answer list. The provided ID indicates this session already exists in persistent storage.

      Parameter:
      id - the unique identifier of an existing quiz session

    • QuizSessionDTO

      public QuizSessionDTO(Date timestamp, int userId)
      Constructor for creating a quiz session with specific timestamp and user.

      Creates a new session (ID = -1) with the provided timestamp and user ID. Initializes with an empty list of user answers.

      Parameter:
      timestamp - the timestamp when this session was created/started
      userId - the ID of the user participating in this session

  • Methodendetails

    • getTimestamp

      public Date getTimestamp()
      Gets the timestamp of when this quiz session was created or started.
      Gibt zurück:
      the session timestamp

    • setTimestamp

      public void setTimestamp(Date timestamp)
      Sets the timestamp for this quiz session.
      Parameter:
      timestamp - the new timestamp for the session

    • getUserId

      public int getUserId()
      Gets the ID of the user participating in this quiz session.
      Gibt zurück:
      the user ID, or -1 if no user is assigned

    • setUserId

      public void setUserId(int userId)
      Sets the ID of the user participating in this quiz session.
      Parameter:
      userId - the user ID to assign to this session

    • getUserAnswers

      public List<UserAnswerDTO> getUserAnswers()
      Gets the list of all user answers collected during this quiz session.
      Gibt zurück:
      the list of user answers, never null

    • setUserAnswers

      public void setUserAnswers(List<UserAnswerDTO> userAnswers)
      Sets the list of user answers for this quiz session.

      If the provided list is null, it will be replaced with an empty ArrayList.

      Parameter:
      userAnswers - the list of user answers to set

    • addUserAnswer

      public void addUserAnswer(UserAnswerDTO userAnswer)
      Adds a user answer to this quiz session.

      If the user answers list is null, it will be initialized before adding the answer.

      Parameter:
      userAnswer - the user answer to add to this session

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts or restarts this quiz session by setting the timestamp to the current time.

      This method can be called to mark the beginning of a quiz session or to update the session timestamp.

    • end

      public void end()
      Ends this quiz session.

      Currently this method serves as a placeholder for any session cleanup logic that might be needed in the future.

    • contentEquals

      protected boolean contentEquals(DataTransportObject other)
      Compares the content of this QuizSessionDTO to another DTO for equality.

      Used when both entities are new and have no assigned ID. Compares timestamp and user ID for equality.

      Angegeben von:
      contentEquals in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Parameter:
      other - another DataTransportObject to compare against
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the timestamp and user ID match, false otherwise

    • contentHashCode

      protected int contentHashCode()
      Computes a hash code based on the session's content.

      Used when the session is a new entity with no ID. Hash is computed from timestamp and user ID.

      Angegeben von:
      contentHashCode in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Gibt zurück:
      hash code from timestamp and userId

    • getContentString

      protected String getContentString()
      Returns a string summary of this quiz session's content for debugging/logging purposes.
      Angegeben von:
      getContentString in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Gibt zurück:
      String in the format: timestamp='...', userId=..., answers=...

    • validate

      protected void validate()
      Validates that the quiz session has valid data.
      • Timestamp must not be null
      • User ID must be non-negative (0 or positive)
      Angegeben von:
      validate in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails
